    • getLoggedInId

      int getLoggedInId(String username, String password) throws HotelException
      Fetches User object from table USER defined by username and password given as parameter
      Parameters:
      username - String value that represents username
      password - String value that represents password
      Returns:
      int value for id
      Throws:
      HotelException - in case of an error
